EngineRule.ruleSpecification:
<AttributeValues objType="wt.change2.WTChangeActivity2">
<!-- set the number to a generated number --> <AttrValue id="number" algorithm="com.ptc.windchill.enterprise.revisionControlled.server.impl.NumberGenerator"> <Arg>ECA</Arg> <Arg>{GEN:wt.enterprise.SequenceGenerator:WTCHANGEACTIVITYID_seq:10:0}</Arg> </AttrValue>
<AttrValue id="lifeCycle.id" algorithm="com.ptc.core.foundation.lifecycle.server.impl.LifeCycleTemplateAttributeAlgorithm"> <Arg>LC_ECA</Arg> </AttrValue>
</AttributeValues>
